title: Mord is way faster than what his movement speed displays
body: I just had a mord outrun me with no items and passive, where I had more movement speed than him?

replies.body: maybe he had approach velocity or celerity

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vQd1BiQI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-18T03:54:47.539+0000)
>
> maybe he had approach velocity or celerity

No i kept an eye on his movement speed it was consistently lower than mine
either a bug or you didn't account for the bonus MS from passive, dunno

> [{quoted}](name=thefatlazycat,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=vQd1BiQI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-18T01:08:04.817+0000)
>
> either a bug or you didn't account for the bonus MS from passive, dunno

Movement speed in this game is actually bullshit and inaccurate i've called this out multiple times but people don't seem to think its an issue. There are multiple times i've seen someone with 20+ less MS than someone and still sprint away/towards them using 0 mobility it's insane
